zh.title: 雪崩币/美元技术分析：[短期下行趋势]
zh.content:
当前雪崩币（AVAX）对美元的价格为10.0333，近期走势显示出一定的下行压力。24小时内价格小幅下降0.34%，高点和低点分别为10.1032和9.884，表明市场在此区间内波动。短期内，价格未能突破10.1的阻力位，显示出买盘力量不足，可能会进一步测试支撑位。

从技术指标来看，虽然RSI数据缺失，但MACD值为负，表明短期内卖方力量较强，市场情绪偏向悲观。20日简单移动平均线（SMA）为10.099730，当前价格低于此水平，进一步确认了当前的下行趋势。市场可能会在这一水平附近遇到阻力，建议投资者保持警惕。

支撑位方面，9.884将是关键支持区，如果价格跌破该水平，可能引发更大的抛售压力，进一步向下探测至9.5区域。反之，如果价格能够重新站上10.1，则可能会形成反弹并重新测试11.0的阻力位。建议投资者关注市场动态，适时调整仓位。

总体而言，雪崩币在短期内面临一定的下行风险，交易者应谨慎评估市场情况，并在适当时机选择进出场策略，以降低风险并把握潜在的交易机会。

en.title: Avalanche vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
The current price of Avalanche (AVAX) against the US Dollar stands at 10.0333, indicating a slight decline of 0.34% over the past 24 hours. The price action is showing signs of consolidation within a broader range, as it has fluctuated between a high of 10.1032 and a low of 9.884 during the same period. This range-bound movement suggests a lack of strong momentum, and traders should remain cautious as the market seeks direction.

From a technical standpoint, the SMA(20) at 10.0997 serves as a significant short-term indicator. The price is currently trading below this moving average, which could signify a bearish sentiment. A potential rebound may occur if the price can reclaim this level, leading to renewed bullish interest. Conversely, failure to hold above the 9.884 support level may trigger further selling pressure, pushing prices lower.

The MACD reading of -0.0885 indicates that momentum is currently negative, although the absence of a signal line complicates the interpretation. Traders should monitor this indicator closely, as a potential crossover could offer insight into a shift in momentum. The RSI(14) is not available at this time, but incorporating this metric in future analysis can provide additional context regarding overbought or oversold conditions.

For traders looking to capitalize on potential movements, establishing buy orders near the support level of 9.884 could provide an advantageous entry point, with a target around the SMA(20). Conversely, a sell position might be considered if the price breaches this support, with a stop-loss set slightly above the recent high of 10.1032 to manage risk effectively. As always, prudent risk management and keeping abreast of market news are essential in the volatile cryptocurrency landscape.
